column4: Okay, Ubuntu gods. I have a really perplexing problem. Cookie to whoever can help. My buddy just installed Ubuntu, all went well. He has two hard-drives, Windows XP on one, 7.10 on the other. After running the Update Manager and Rebooting, the NIC card will not be recognized. Not in ubuntu, Not in windows, not on the liveCD.
In other words, he has no internet device in either Ubuntu, or windows, or the LiveCD.
seems like HW failure indeed... maybe check your bios settings aswell
